statement: You dislike the fact that your health is slowly deteriorating after each cigarette.
How do you feel about the impact of your smoking habits on your health?
You were in a lot of pain.
How do you believe your experiences of pain have influenced your habits?
You enjoy the calming effect nicotine gives you.
How does the calming effect of nicotine influence your feelings towards it?
You use amphetamines too often.
How do you feel about your current frequency of amphetamine use?
You dislike how cigarette smoke smells.
How does the smell of cigarette smoke make you feel?
You're here to talk about your gambling, is that right?
Could we explore your thoughts and feelings about your gaming activities?
You realize that by making this change you will have a big impact on your life and you are looking forward to how it will look.
How do you envision the impact this change could potentially have on your life, and what are you most looking forward to about it?
You are concerned with the costs of smoking.
How do you feel about the financial implications of your smoking habit?
You believe that by making changes to your smoking habit, you can improve your health.
Have you ever thought about how altering your smoking habits could have the potential to enhance your health?
You realize that quitting smoking is important for your health and would like to make this happen without relying on cigarettes.
Have you thought about what it might look like for you to improve your health, such as exploring the possibility of not relying on cigarettes anymore?
You enjoy smoking because it helps you cope with stressful situations.
Have you ever considered what role smoking plays in helping you manage stressful situations?
You got mad at the way you were being treated, and so decided not to interact further.
Have you ever felt that your reaction to pull away from interaction was a result of feeling treated unfairly?
It would be a good idea for you to go through detoxification.
Have you ever considered what your experience might be like if you tried detoxification?
You realize that cigarettes can potentially cause financial stress and you wish you could spend less on tobacco.
Have you ever thought about how your finances might benefit if you reconsidered your tobacco use?
You dislike the health risks of smoking.
How do you feel about the health risks associated with your smoking habits?
Quitting smoking will require you to find a way to distract yourself from the craving for cigarettes.
Have you thought about what strategies you might use to manage your cigarette cravings when you decide you're ready to quit smoking?
It reminds you of your heart attack.
How does this experience relate to your feelings or thoughts about your past heart attack?
Setting long-term plans for your smoking habit would help you quit.
Have you ever considered creating a long-term plan for your smoking habit as a possible strategy for quitting?
You realize that if you stop smoking, you can reduce the strain on your body.
Have you ever thought about how your body might feel if you were to cut down on smoking or eventually quit?
Social interaction makes you afraid.
How do you feel about your experiences with social interaction?
You value productivity and would like to increase it by smoking less.
How do you feel your productivity may change if you considered reducing your smoking habit?
It is time to create a plan to stop drinking.
Have you ever considered what your life might look like if you made a plan to reduce your drinking?
You want to establish a daily routine so you can smoke at your ease.
Have you considered what it might look like if you were to establish a daily routine that comfortably accommodates your smoking habits?
If you set long-term plans for your smoking habit, you will be more likely to succeed.
Have you thought about setting long-term plans for your smoking habits and how it might impact your success?
You're don't want to break up with your partner because you're you won't find someone else.
Have you ever taken a moment to explore your feelings about the possibility of not being able to find another partner if you decide to end your current relationship?
You're finding that you drink a lot when you're alone.
Have you noticed how your drinking habits might change when you're by yourself?
You don't like thinking about smoking because you're afraid to die.
Could it be that reflecting on your smoking habits is difficult for you because of worries about your health?
You dislike that others know that you smoke.
How do you feel about others being aware of your smoking habit?
You want to stop smoking cigars altogether.

You seem low-energy.
